summary: Shōnen manga, meaning "boys' comics," is a type of Japanese comic book mainly for teenage boys. It's one of the most popular manga categories in Japan, but people of all ages and genders read it. These comics often feature action, adventure, and fighting evil. They started in the early 1900s and became very popular by the 1920s. Besides action, shōnen manga also includes other genres like comedy, romance, and sports.
title: Shōnen manga
